pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyze Forest Diversity and Dynamics // To help you access, transform, analyze, and visualize ForestGEO data, we developed a collection of R packages (https://forestgeo.github.io/fgeo/). This package, in particular, helps you to install and load the entire package-collection with a single R command, and provides convenient ways to find relevant documentation. Most commonly, you should not worry about the individual packages that make up the package-collection as you can access all features via this package. To learn more about ForestGEO visit http://www.forestgeo.si.edu/.
